characters: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-A FEW MOMENTS LATER
EXT. ZOEY'S APARTMENT BUILDING- SOMETIME LATER
INT. ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT- A FEW MOMENTS LATER
OTHER SIDE OF THE FIELD-AWAY FROM THE BATTLE
RYAN BLOOD'S APARTMENT- A FEW MOMENTS LATER
ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT-A FEW HOURS LATER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A nervous leg shakes under the table. The appendage seems to be attached to someone who has a lot on their mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOUIS, a college student in his late twenties stares at a friend who is sitting off screen. Louis is calm, almost villainous in how collective he is. He stares at this unseen friend, trying to assess the cause for his anxious state.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smug) Something is bothering you... We finally see QUINN, also in his late twenties. He is obviously uneasy about being out in public with this person.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate the faux concern but I'm fine. Louis is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My concern is genuine...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With our history can you honestly say you care about my well being?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I can, our connection is a product of destiny. I have no ill-will against you. Quinn scoffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -The Stephen Speilberg film?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, there was that little French girl I liked. You..you violated her and torched her farm killing her family-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Actually you are jacking up the story, I violated her father in front of her...then I torched the farm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...that makes it ten times better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn that was war, people do crazy things midst of wide spread conflict. I have gotten jaded over time. It's not like the dark ages when I had style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you would rape the horses and ride away on the women?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I was such a ham. (beat) Quinn, this is what we do. I have gotten carried away in the past, but now I'm tired. I just want to get this over with. It's our calling, we help bring order and balance to the universe. (beat) Maybe I would feel less removed if you would let me win just once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't a 1930's boxing match. If I take dive, I'm not lining the pockets of some bookie...I'm bringing on the apocalypse. Louis takes a drink of his coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See at least our obligation would be over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis I might be nervous, but I accept my role as savior of this world. (beat) We have been doing this for years-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -centuries-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -and in 5 days we will do the same thing we have always done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat) We'll fight to the death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atta' boy!

dialogues.speaker: INT. CAFE-DAY-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: We pan across the cafe to the table of ZOEY and RICK, a young college aged couple. Zoey is obviously trying to have a serious conversation, while Rick hides behind his laptop using it as a shield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I'm not saying this is an intervention. Rick doesn't look up from his laptop screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wouldn't there be more people here if it was an intervention?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See and I don't want it to be-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (disinterested) -That's because it's not

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just...I mean...are you gambling again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (totally removed) Nope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because...um...the laptop, and you never go anywhere with out it-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -it's my lifeline-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Yeah well...I just know when I met you I saved you from that downhill spiral...you know...uh...the online poker-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -I'm not a project, you know that right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not...I never said you were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you act like it...I wonder if I didn't have this "so called problem" if you would have even been interested in me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I would. I just-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Take it upon yourself to save people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK...maybe. Honestly we have to save each other, who else is going to do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continued to be removed) People could just save themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True. Is that human nature? People rely on false deities, self help books...Rick the day I realized we were alone in the universe was the day I realized we have to be there for each other. (beat) Plus don't you find it romantic that I want to save you? Like a movie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So our relationship is like a romantic comedy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dreamy) A Cameron Crowe romantic comedy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh well...so do you want to see what I'm doing on the computer? Zoey feels like she has broken down the "wall".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...of course!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick spins the computer around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check that out Lloyd Dobler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Shocked) Is that...porn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Tube...like You Tube...but with porn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um.... (lightbulb) wait...is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Us having sex?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah... Rick reaches over and points at the laptop screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love the part coming up. (beat) You know where I put your legs behind your head and yell "hump bunny!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...um...I'm not OK with this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...OK...I'm also breaking up with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Yeah not working any more for me-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?!? How is it not working?!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are yelling...you know I don't like confrontational situations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not trying to be confrontational...I just...you are breaking up with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Yeah...Can I have my laptop back now? Zoey, still confused, slowly turns the laptop back toward Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at the screen) This part is fucking priceless. Zoey is bewildered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis kicks at the ground, almost as if he was searching for something. His foot finally rests on a broken tree limb. He places his foot under it and kicks it up to his right hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This will do. He throws it over to Quinn, who catches it in one swift move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what are you wanting to do? Louis searches around for a stick of his own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figure we would train...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? Louis finds what he is looking for as he spins his limb into attack position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you dominate me every time- (beat) -ohh that sounded dirty

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you want me to help you get an advantage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I want you to help me put on a good show. Everyone loves a good climax Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: PARK-RIVERSIDE-CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Zoey sits on a bench beside her best friend ANNA. Zoey is completely distant, as Anna's words pass through her into thin air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I don't like interjecting myself into other people's affairs but-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (barley paying attention) -But you're going to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You let Rick do this to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Snapping to it) How so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you can change the men you are with. You can't get into a relationship with someone in the hopes that you can mold them into the person you want them to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick needed someone stable-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Rick needs castrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's slightly strong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was an asshole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Misunderstood-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -OK I'll meet you half way...misunderstood asshole. (beat) You have been repeating the same cycle your whole entire life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that's a little off base.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY 10 YEARS OLD
dialogues.text: A young BOY is sitting on another little boy's head. It looks like he is passing gas on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember Billy, who used to give kids the "dirty bomb"? You took it upon yourself to change this behavior- The boy is now doing the same to Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -This put you right in the cross-hairs to be his next victim.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY 13 YEARS OLD
dialogues.text: ZACK, a young teenager is selling drugs on the street corner. His bags of coke should be exaggerated, as well as the customers coming up to buy from him. Think if South Park was crossed with HBO's The Wire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good old Zack the neighbourhood drug dealer- Zoey takes Zack into a room labeled "Rehab" on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You took it upon yourself to be his personal savoir. What did it get you? Zack is out with Zoey when a few of his old GANG FRIENDS show up looking to collect. Zack opens his pockets to show he doesn't have any dough on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well when Zach's old business partners wanted to collect on a debt- Zack slowly pushes Zoey toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few days later we see Zoey being used as a human coffee table as the gang uses her back to cut cocaine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - they used you to replace their missing coffee table they broke during a drunken party. ZOEY 17 YEARS OLD. A gang member looks directly into the camera. He smiles showing his golden grille.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -And then you have Toothpick. What kind of name is Toothpick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was his gang name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. It's prom night and Toothpick is in his "pimp" tux. He takes a swig of his "40" while he dances with Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We won't talk about prom night. Needless to say it wasn't romantic. Toothpick and Zoey are in an hotel room. Toothpick is standing over Zoey, who is facedown on the bed. It appears he is urinating on her. It's hard to tell with the black censor bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exaggerations-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Accurate account of events... The story of your romantic life-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Unfair. Because these people need someone who is going to sacrifice their own needs for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who else is going to do it? We're alone in the universe. If we are going to make it through this "crazy world" we need to look out for each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you use atheism and the whole "we are alone in the universe" jive to justify your actions. (beat) I regret taking you to see Dawkins because you use that as a fall back to be codependent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First of all you are bitter about the whole Dawkins thing, because you flashed him your tits and got us kicked out-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You didn't even know the first thing about "The God Delusion" until I gave you a copy-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -And someone who was huge supporter turns her back because Richard Dawkins didn't like her nipple piercing-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (playful banter) -Enjoy your suite in hell non-believer-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (more banter) -Enjoy your delusional life there fence sitter. How about you pray to Thor to hit me with a lighting bolt so I can be removed from this asinine conversation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're hiding behind this religious debate because you don't want to admit you have always gravitated toward the "wrong type" of guy. Zoey is staring off into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (detached) I actually stopped listening to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you staring at? Zoey points at Quinn and Louis, who are fighting with tree limbs in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are those guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The one closest to us is Quinn. Very weird, socially awkward type of guy. I don't know who his friend is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Looks like that stuff my ex- Rob was into-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh that medieval rugby style game-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Yeah the made up sport from "Blood Of Heroes"...Oh...Jugger!-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Sounds pornographic. (beat) So Quinn? What else do you know about him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no you don't! This is exactly what I was talking about! Anna senses something in Zoey that she is trying to hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second? You've already established contact with Quinn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this MI-6?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have your sights on him already!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm just curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: PARK-RIVERSIDE-EARLIER
dialogues.text: Zoey is overcome with emotion as she makes her way down to the riverside. She is holding something tight in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As her hand opens a class ring was digging into her palm. It appears this might have belonged to Rick.

dialogues.speaker: PARK-RIVERSIDE
dialogues.text: Still teary eyed, Zoey angrily throws the ring toward the river. A gust of wind causes the ring to curve and it slams into the temple of a man sitting on a park bench. Zoey walks over to apologize and meets Quinn for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (making her way to the bench) I'm so sorry Quinn rubs his temple and then reaches down to pick up the ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (handing the ring back to her) Is this yours? She takes the ring and shoves it into her pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda... Again I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need to apologize. Quinn scoots over and motions for her to sit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want to sit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (unsure)

dialogues.speaker: OK
dialogues.text: Zoey sits, still apprehensive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reaching her hand out) I'm Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (He returns the gesture) Quinn. (beat) Zoey? Interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh name? Yes, most people have interesting stories behind their names...Honestly I have nothing. Not sure why my parents did that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very unique.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) I suppose that's a compliment. So I've seen you around school, but never really...in...class...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't go to Marshall, I live near the campus though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, well so what do you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As in profession? I don't really have one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? Rent is insane around here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, my father provides for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's pretty cool. What's he into?

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: Everything.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: An entrepreneur...That's awesome. (beat) Well...So do you like coming down here?

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: To the river?

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: (smiles) Yes where we are right now.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: I just needed to think.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Yeah me too. I just suffered a break up.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: My apologies.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: No it's OK. I mean I'm over it.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (laughs) My head disagrees.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: It's really OK.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: So what did you need to think about? I mean if I'm not prying of course.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: No, I just have some problems. (beat) I'm not sure about my calling in life.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: I'm not sure anyone is. You know if you need a friend, I'd be glad to...well you know...listen.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: I'd appreciate that. I don't have many friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. (trying to double back) I mean...I've seen you around campus...you seem like a loner...I didn't mean you were a loser. Loner is kind of sexy, loser...well can kind of be too...I'll stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's OK. I agree it never hurts to have a friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we can maybe go out to dinner if you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I can pay, you know..make up for the head...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really don't have to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I want to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... (beat) Good let's meet up tonight. My place, 7pm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACK, A 20 year old gay man who loves him a good "Cosby Sweater", is sitting at the computer desk "surfing" on the desktop. Anna walks up from behind and runs her fingers through Jack's hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So when does Ted Bundy get here? We follow Anna across the room where she plops herself down on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promised her we would behave. A KNOCK is heard at the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Although knocking right as I sat down doesn't endear him to me... Jack gets up from the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sit your pretty little ass down hooker. Anna adjusts herself back down into the comfy couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is why I don't need a boyfriend. You are way to good to me. Jack opens the door to reveal Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at this mother fucker. He rudely motions him to come in and sit down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is in the bathroom getting ready for a night of manipulation, sit the fuck down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused) Um...OK? In almost the same beat, Zoey walks into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn, is he being rude?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at Jack) No quite pleasant. Zoey reaches out her hand to help Quinn off the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at Quinn) I will call the state police in a fucking heart beat if she isn't here by midnight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still confused)

dialogues.speaker: OK
dialogues.text: Anna grabs the remote trying to ignore the situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anna, you going to call the guard dog off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of it) David Smith's Candytakers is on tonight. I'm relaxing and not getting in the middle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (To Jack and Anna) Nice meeting both of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the fuck out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jack and Anna) Don't wait up Zoey and Quinn leave the apartment as Jack stares daggers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey shuts the door and then turns to stop Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry about Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like him.

dialogues.speaker: INT. RESTAURANT-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Zoey and Quinn are enjoying their meal at this fancy upscale establishment. Quinn picks up his menu, running his finger down though the menu items.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey I would be more than happy to pay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No not at all. This is on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can cover dessert at least.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen Quinn, I'm an atheist-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -So you don't want dessert?-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -No, I just wanted to get it out of the way. It bothers people, I mean in this state especially. Quinn puts down the menu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't bother me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe anyone is truly an atheist at the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm pretty sure I'm really an atheist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I'm a logical thinker. (beat) I don't mean to offend, I'm guessing you're religious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One supports the business they are in I guess.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Oh my God you are in the ministry.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (smiles) Kind of.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: My father was a "fire and damnation" preacher. Baptist...He's...

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: He's?

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: It's nothing. (beat) Sorry I don't mean to rock your world.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (smiles) You didn't.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: You poor thing. You are probably so desperate for friends-

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (laughs) What?

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Have you thought about St John's Wort?

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: You are a very cryptic speaker.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: No I'm thinking out loud mostly. I was just...well...you have some social awkwardness.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Well you are latching on to religion to make you feel whole. It doesn't make you feel whole, or at least as whole as you thought it would-

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: You are kind of right on that one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you are out with me...I represent everything you were brought up to combat. You're missing something and you are looking for help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am looking for help. I'm out with you though because I'm interested in getting to know you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) See I'm good at reading people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rolls eyes, smiles) Kind of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know Quinn you seem like a lost soul. I thought that when I saw you by the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like lost souls don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I actually do. Someone needs to save them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You going to save me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you let me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you might be able to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (endearing smile) So what do you need Quinn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Dessert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is passed out drooling on the couch. Anna and Zoey are cross legged on the floor in the midst of "girl talk".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, he seems fishy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He seems harmless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have heard that a million times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. He's in the ministry-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -and you hate organized religion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know and he's understanding of that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plus it's to my understanding he didn't actually admit what he did. He just did a bunch of double talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was understood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah again...not feeling confident in your choices. Please Zoey... (beat)... Be careful this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn is sleeping in his bed. His room is rather bare, with the exception of the basic living necessities. It almost appears like a room at the "Y".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A foot is seen kicking the bed, startling Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN'S ROOM
dialogues.text: Quinn flies out of bed and sees Louis leaning against the wall with his arms crossed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where were you last night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (getting his bearings) Out...thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've done a lot of mopping and thinking over the centuries. It kind of brings me down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what do you need?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Training.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis and Quinn walk out into a huge open field. Louis is carrying a black tote bag that he drops on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now this is a place for a climatic battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad. Quinn points at the bag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's in the bag?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will love this. Louis goes to the tote bag and starts to unzip it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I went to the toy store last night and picked these up. He reaches into the bag and pulls out two "nurf" style swords out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing like our real stuff, but it will do. Louis throws one of the "swords" to Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (catching it) It's kind of lightweight..and silly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis comes over carrying his sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on give it a chance. Louis comes at Quinn and his instinct kicks in. The two begin their mock battle.

dialogues.speaker: TREE
dialogues.text: From behind a tree we see RYAN BLOOD for the first time. He hides in the shadows taking pictures with his digital camera. Quinn and Louis continue to practice unaware of the unwanted attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis sips his coffee, while Quinn just stares out the front window. It almost as if he is searching for something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have not been lively at all this go around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lot on my mind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We only do this once every seventy years brother. You have to enjoy it while it lasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis our whole purpose here, is to show up, and over time establish a social base, and then kill each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know and I'm very good at the social base part, and you are not so good...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's because you find a way to screw it up every time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's because, I know this is news to you, I represent evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's the thing though, I'm tired Quinn. I really want to stop being the ambassador for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's something we agree on. I'm tired too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if we can get off this train. It's just a viscous cycle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Letting you win is not an option.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't going there... (beat) ...yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn is sitting on the couch as Jack and Anna make their way for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys leaving? Zoey comes out of the kitchen with a bowl of popcorn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah we don't want to interrupt your "date rape". Anna hits Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Jack! He can't do anything here anyway. Too much exposure. Witnesses my friend...We knew he was here. Zoey sits down and hands the bowl to Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you guys stop??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK. I like your friends. Anna walks over to the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So Quinn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey says you are in the ministry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sort of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are or you aren't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's complicated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At some point you will have to explain it to Zoey. I mean don't you agree?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (put out) Will you guys leave?? Jack grabs Anna by the arm and leads her to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is going too far now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Date Rape"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (trying to make a point) Bye guys! Anna and Jack mumble as they head out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning to Quinn) Sorry about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's really OK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack puts his arm around Anna, as to stop her for a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I hate him because it's my nature but-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You think I hate him because of my distrust of men?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tragedy changes people, it effected Zoey in one way...you in another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah (beat,smiles) I became a "fag hag"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is curled up next to Quinn on the couch. A popcorn bowl is squeezed in between them. She reaches over and picks up the remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tonight's Feature Presentation is "I am Curious:Yellow". Probably not the best date movie, but I always show this to ever guy in the beginning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK this will be my first film experience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I've never seen a film before. I mean I know of films, can't live in this world and not. I've just never seen one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This might be a little hard-core for your first film.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it's OK. I'm excited. Zoey shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel like I'm stealing your virginity here. Zoey slowly looks over at Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a virgin too aren't you? Quinn shrugs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god! I'm a bad girl. Quinn puts his hand on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) You are not. Quinn motions to the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please play the film.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hesitant) OK? I mean I usually play this for potential boyfriends. If they can handle this, they can handle me. Zoey hits play on the remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you're lucky I thought about "They Call Her One Eye". (to herself) I hope this doesn't jack you up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn is sitting cross legged in the middle of the field. He seems as though he is in the middle of a trance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) I am curious Yellow... Louis walks up and throws a toy sword on Quinn's lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you talking about? Quinn stands up and grabs the sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing really. The two start to sword fight, but Quinn does not have his heart in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You half asleep Quinn? Quinn stops for a second and drops his sword down to his side. Louis pokes Quinn in the chest with the tip of his sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at that ladies and gentleman the apocalypse has begun. Quinn sits down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you ever seen a movie? Louis follows his lead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen plenty of movies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I watched "The Sorrow and The Pity" at Marshal the other day. You know people here have yet to figure out we are not students.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think they have a pretty good idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So in all the times we have been here, you haven't gone to the cinema?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not what we are here to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In your bosses name, what is wrong with you? You've got to enjoy yourself. You might be chosen, but you have needs. We all do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to stay focused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've also burned yourself out. You're not going to be any good to me... Louis gets up and reaches out to help Quinn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...unless you take some "you" time. Quinn takes Louis' hand and gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we get back to the matter at hand? Louis brings his sword back up into attack position. Quinn is back to his "swashbuckling" self. The two battle it out on the field, matching each other blow for blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We creep upon Ryan Blood as he works at his computer. On closer inspection, it appears he is editing video of Quinn and Louis' mock fight earlier in the day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis' set up is more lavish than Quinn's. It's obvious he indulges just a little too much. Louis comes out of the bathroom with a towel around his waist. He starts singing "Motown" songs to himself. He walks back off screen to the bedroom. We still hear him singing, as we pan around the apartment. We swing back around to the entrance of Louis' bedroom. He finally comes out fully dressed. He uses the towel he was wearing to finish drying his hair. He walks up to a mirror and starts looking at himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to run his hands through his hair. He tries to straighten up the mess on his head. He picks up some gel and squirts a small amount in his hand. He runs it through his hair, getting the desired look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) You are a handsome devil.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS APARTMENT
dialogues.text: Louis spins around and grabs his keys off of the coffee table. He then dances right out the door.

dialogues.speaker: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-A FEW MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Louis walks into Quinn's room and finds him not there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (puzzled) Weird? Louis walks out into...

dialogues.speaker: HALLWAY
dialogues.text: ...the hallway. Ryan Blood is standing in the doorway of his room, across the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You looking for Quinn? Takes Louis' a second to register Ryan's question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nodding toward the exit door) He just left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis runs outside. He looks up and down the street. In the distance he finally spots them, Quinn and Zoey holding hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) What do we have here?

dialogues.speaker: EXT. CAFE-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Louis stands across the street, staring right into the window of the cafe. He clearly sees Quinn and Zoey on a date. His eyes widen as their hands touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey and Quinn walk holding hands through the apartment building parking lot. Zoey stops for a second and turns to face Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why haven't I seen your place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My place isn't very exciting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't surprise me. I can't imagine you having a vast Blu Ray collection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blu Ray?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow...Quinn, you have to start enjoying the world around you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I realized today you are right about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're saying you want to come up stairs and watch "They Call Her One Eye"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) Uh...no. I'm still trying to get I am Curious Yellow out of my head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...sorry about that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) It's OK. Suddenly, guided by instinct, Zoey kisses Quinn on the lips. Quinn is completely thrown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I..I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No don't be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I shouldn't have been that aggressive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...it's OK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to get back though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puzzling...but I know...virgin and all-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Well...I mean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That came out rude...I just mean...I wanted to do it. I should have taken it slower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK. I'll be by tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (worried) I hope so. Quinn slowly turns around and walks away. Zoey looks at him like she is unsure if she will see him again.

dialogues.speaker: DUMPSTER
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, leaning against the dumpster, Louis watches the display unseen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ryan is working at his PC when a KNOCK is heard. He gets up from his messy desk and makes his way over to the door. As he swings it open we see Louis on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: RYAN BLOOD'S APARTMENT- A FEW MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Ryan leans back in his desk chair. Louis has cleared off a spot on a messy couch. The apartment, simply put, is a "shithole"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're here to learn more about his "coming and goings". To find out what I have seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So far you are dead on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's more than that Louis-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You know who I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know pretty much everything. I've watched you, studied you...I feel I'm expert on your little game every seventy years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes. Ryan picks up a stack of documents and throws the papers one at a time at Louis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You battled as mortals- (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -You were a Lamanite then- (beat) -Quinn was a commander of the Nephites, last survivor of that nation- (beat) -The savoir spoke to him, showed him his future...his destiny- (beat) -See after the death of Christ there was some debate on what was going to bring on the end and signal his return- (beat) - It was decided two great warriors had to fight. The winner would determine the start of the apocalypse. Your boss of course needed someone to represent his interests. Who better than Quinn's old adversary? Louis brushes the pile of papers of his lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going with this you weird little man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You had strategy in the beginning. Middle Ages...Old West...Even World War II. (beat) Let's take a step back for a second. The Old West. Lack of faith, corruption, these things make Quinn weak. The chink in his armor is his faith in people. You knew that, and corrupting America...a young land...was the key. (beat) Quinn was a step ahead of you, and looked for a human ally. That ally was Joseph Smith, and Quinn...or I mean Moroni...led Joseph to the plates that later when into- Ryan picks a book up and throws it at Louis. Louis looks down at the "Book Of Mormon".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -His little plan didn't work, but the book is a great coffee table discussion piece. This made him weak Louis. You could have destroyed him. The problem is you've allowed yourself to become fond of him. YOU need to embrace your destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do I do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This girl is distracting him. Get his mind focused on the matter at hand. At this point I'm afraid he isn't even going to fight you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm surprised this girl even likes Quinn. He comes across creepy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe that's the key-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (lightbulb) -Make her think he's crazy.

dialogues.speaker: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Quinn opens the door to his room and spies a silhouette in the far corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where have you been? The silhouette comes out of the darkness and into view. It should come to no surprise that Louis is emerging from the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been waiting long?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I figured you were on your way back-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -because you are spying on me again? So I don't need to tell you where I've been. Louis sits down on the edge of the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's started again. You're already jealous. You are going to do the same thing you did during the war...you're going to sabotage this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm insulted frankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you play that game. You are being facetious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm being serious. You care about the girl, it's obvious. Not in a friendship or I'm curious about human behavior way. Quinn sits down beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you told her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who I am? Of course not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn you only have a few days left and you care for this girl- (beat) - What's the harm in telling her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a lot of harm in telling her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this is real and you really care for this girl, you have to tell her. It's only fair to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has a best friend who is very guarded of me...It's odd she eluded to the same thing. You know the whole "I'm hiding something, and I need to come out into the open" thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds to me like she is right. Quinn gets up and walks to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I better do this now then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah you don't want to lose your nerve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you let yourself out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. Quinn slowly opens the door and walks out. The door creeps shut behind him. Louis smiles to himself, feeling satisfaction. His face looks evil, almost demonic.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. ZOEY'S APARTMENT BUILDING- SOMETIME LATER
dialogues.text: In almost a "romantic movie" way, Quinn runs toward Zoey's apartment. When he reaches the door he knocks like his life depends on it. Anna swings the door open, she's obviously surprised to see Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell? You can hear Jack inside the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck?!? I want to watch Bring me the Head of Alfredo Garcia in peace!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to see Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about tomorrow? Or never is good. You hear Zoey off screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?? Zoey comes to the doorway and stands behind Anna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn? What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to talk to you, it's important. Quinn grabs her by the arm and pulls her outside, pushing her right past Anna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ! Anna slams the door shut, leaving Zoey and Quinn outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to tell you everything. Anna is so right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? Anna is right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've not been honest with you about what I do...or who I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to come clean. I want you to trust me. I want your friends to trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervous laugh) OK Quinn, just spit it out.

dialogues.speaker: OK
dialogues.text: (beat) I'm an archangel named Moroni and I basically represent "light" or everything that's good. Louis, my friend, represents "darkness". Every seventy years we have to fight to the death. If I win everything stays the way it is. The world continues turning. If I lose, Louis takes on the role of the Antichrist and the apocalypse will be unleashed. I'm talking Book of Revelations stuff here. So I only have a limited time left in this world... (beat) I want to spend that time with you. Zoey is stunned, silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh honey... Zoey touches his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must have a brain tumor or something. You're obviously mentally ill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey? I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey puts her finger up to his lips to quiet him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh. You need me more than ever. Zoey reaches down and takes a confused Quinn's hand. She leads him to the door. Like a sheep herder, she takes Quinn inside of the apartment. The last image we see is the apartment door slamming behind them.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK-ZOEY'S HOME-YEARS EARLIER-DAY
dialogues.text: Zoey, roughly 2 years old, sits in the floor of her parent's home playing. Her DAD, only seen from the waist down, walks in front of Zoey with his bible in hand. He makes it to Zoey's MOM, on the other side of the room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not even helping me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't even know what you want!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't run my congregation with this sickness!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sickness is in your head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're too busy running around doing whatever you feel like. I'm going to fall apart and it's all on you.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK-ZOEY'S HOME-TEN YEARS LATER-DAY
dialogues.text: Zoey, now 12, is going through some boxes in the closet. Her head bumps a shelf and a box falls on her. When she goes to pick up the box she finds a ton of VHS tapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes through the box looking at the labels: "Anna age 7" "Anna age 10" "Anna age 12".

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK-ZOEY'S ROOM-A FEW MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The glow of Zoey's TV fills her face. We can neither see nor hear what she is watching. Zoey looks like she is about to throw up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey jumps out of bed, like she is waking from a nightmare. A startled Quinn, who was sleeping beside her, starts to arouse.

dialogues.speaker: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Louis walks into Quinn's room with his black tote bag from earlier. It's obvious he was meeting Quinn to go train. He looks through out the room, but quickly realizes Quinn is probably with Zoey. He slumps down on Quinn's bed. Anger and hurt is portrayed upon his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn and Zoey are having coffee. It's obvious Zoey had a rough night. She takes a sip of coffee, her mind is distant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enjoy myself? Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Based on how you are acting this morning I have my doubts. That's not what I meant though. You woke up screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand if you don't want to talk about it. I'm just concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not a big deal. It was...a...well wouldn't call it a nightmare...repressed memory. Hell, it's not repressed...I think of it all the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't want to hear about it. Quinn touches her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please? Zoey takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My father, I mentioned him before, was a Baptist minister. He always said he had this "sickness". He begged my mom for help, it was more important though for her to having shopping and dinner dates with her girlfriends. Anna, my friend that "loves you", has been in my life since I was tiny. She used to come over all the time. My Dad adored her. When I was around twelve I found something in the closet...tapes. My Dad and Anna from the time she was like seven...He... (starts tearing up) I showed my Mom, and Dad...well he got out of prison when I was seventeen. I don't see him anymore. His church, even though they knew he had a problem disowned him. He wouldn't have done that to Anna if my mom would have supported him, got him help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who do you think is to blame?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tried to get help Quinn, he reached out to my Mom. I should have protected Anna too...I mean-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -None of this was your fault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to protect people. This was out of my control, you Quinn...What's going on with you...I have control of that. Quinn looks at Zoey. He loves her, but a part of him pities her too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is curled up under Quinn's arm as they sit on the same bench from earlier. Quinn stares out toward the river. It's obvious he is pondering over his choices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love being with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't renege on my responsibilities with Louis though. Zoey sits up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not actually going to fight your friend to the death are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you don't understand this. We just need to make the most of our time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn, in 2 days things are going to be normal. This is just a delusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you don't understand. I just need to go see Louis today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand that. Quinn leans his head back. He catches something out of the corner of his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn sees Ryan Blood hiding behind a tree. He is taking video of Quinn and Zoey with a "smart phone".

dialogues.speaker: PARK-RIVERSIDE
dialogues.text: Quinn jolts up. Zoey is alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? Quinn doesn't answer. He gets up and runs to the...

dialogues.speaker: TREE
dialogues.text: Quinn looks behind the tree, but Ryan is long gone. Zoey comes up from behind, she places her hand on Quinn's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My neighbor Ryan Blood...looks like he's spying on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to go see Louis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis is watching the video on the smart phone. He's seen enough, he throws it back to Ryan. Louis tosses trash off the couch so he can sit down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sitting down) I thought him admitting his true self would break them up-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ryan plops down in his computer desk chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Instead he is still hot and heavy with her. (beat) He even did the "bipty boom" last night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight is pointless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not pointless. The game has just changed is all. (beat) We have two levels here: one is making sure we keep him engaged. (beat) Honestly though that's an afterthought at this point-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what's the next move? Ryan reaches into his desk drawer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still searching) Well when he does become engaged... Ryan throws something at Louis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis catches the item. He looks down to see a nine millimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...We need to make sure you still have the advantage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is pacing back and forth. Jack rubs his face in frustration. He is tired of watching Zoey tear herself up over this guy. Anna tries to step into Zoey's path attempting to get her attention

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is jittery, she can't handle Anna blocking her way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I haven't heard from Quinn since he wigged out today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well honestly maybe that's a good thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He needs me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He doesn't need you! Not everyone needs you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frustrated) This isn't about me and you-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -This is about me and you! You think you can make up for what happened. The fact you didn't notice, couldn't save me in time. You were a child! I was a child! You couldn't have saved your father either! Your mother couldn't have, no one could have! He was a fucking pedophile! Zoey slaps Anna across the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hate me all you want, but it's impossible to redeem yourself for things you had no control over. Jack is sick and tired of this display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just show her the fucking file. Jack gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused) What fucking file?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn runs toward Louis' apartment. His KNOCKS sound like a jackhammer on the door. Louis answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. We do. Louis moves slightly and we see Ryan Blood in the background. Louis slowly closes the door in a stunned Quinn's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis turns toward Ryan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought coming here would give us some privacy from Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it worked out perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack walks into the room holding a file folder. Zoey is sitting on the couch trying to get a grip. Jack throws the file in her lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So is the file folder for dramatic effect?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it was to keep everything organized... (beat) ...and for dramatic effect. Suddenly Zoey's cell phon rings. She sets the folder aside and answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn is on a pay phone, he's shaking. At this point he is lost on what his next move should be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ryan Blood!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mentioned that earlier. What is going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's with Louis. They're planning to kill me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought that was the whole plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it's...this isn't like Louis. I think he is trying to cheat his way to a win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you come over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Quinn get a grip. Just calm down and come over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK so just come on over and we'll talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No I mean you're right. I need to get control of myself. I have a destiny. I need to figure out my next move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn? No wait- Quinn hangs up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT
dialogues.text: Zoey slowly drops her cell phone to the floor. Jack picks up the folder Zoey set aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. He's losing it. Jack hands her the folder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to look at this. Zoey takes the folder from him and starts reading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I spent a lot of time gathering that information.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what is all this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn Wilson and Louis Marks were orphans. Zoey is flipping through documents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn displayed some erratic behavior from the beginning. One of the staff members was Mormon and they would read stories to Quinn out of the Book Of Mormon. That employee was later fired, but a seed was planted in Quinn's head. He kept going on about how he and Louis were meant to fight to the death. Some of the children at the time claim Louis would encourage this behavior. He probably thought this was Quinn's attempt at playing. (beat) As things continued the staff at the orphanage thought Quinn needed help beyond what they could offer. They sent Quinn to a hospital. Zoey puts the folder down, the documents fall to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not telling me anything I didn't already know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That makes it worse. You're going to continue this now that you know for a fact that he is nuts?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm too far into this now. I don't have a choice. Zoey picks the documents up and places them in the folder. She then tosses the folder on the coffee table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you let us save you? Please Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me be guys. Zoey walks to her bedroom, leaving Anna and Jack exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT-EARLY MORNING
dialogues.text: The apartment is quiet. Anna no where in sight, more than likely in her room sleeping. Jack is passed out on the couch. Zoey walks in, it's obvious she hasn't slept all night. She scoots Jack's legs over and sits on the couch. She proceeds to pick up the file folder. She starts thumbing through the documents. After a few moments she finds one of interest. She reaches over and pushes Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rousing up) Ehhh...what? You better be a hot bear of a man. Jack looks up and sees Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or Zoey...What do you need hun? Zoey hands Jack a document from the folder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this? Jack's eyes try to focus on the document.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like a room list from the psych hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gathered that. Under Quinn's room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn and his roommate is listed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn's roommate was Ryan Blood?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...looks that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Louis stares out into the open field. A gust of wind blows through his hair. Ryan Blood comes up from behind and pats Louis on the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to talk. Louis turns around to face Ryan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strategy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strategy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I have a method-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -I have to hear this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A 12 point system-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused) - Like 12 steps?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly. It's a sure fire plan to throw Quinn off of his game Louis laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh I am so all ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well the first thing you need is a battle cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me? A battle cry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes a battle cry. Every great warrior has one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And a battle cry is going to give me the advantage in battle?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course it will. Why don't you try one out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, try one out right now. It's liberating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd rather not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (extremely confused) Right here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here I'll go first- Ryan let's out a scream that sounds as though he is being sodomized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was...interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? (beat) Your turn. Louis looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So right now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. Louis inhales deeply and then lets out a scream. It comes out more like frightened little girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh come on! That sounds like you are scared of the battle. What? Are you scared of Quinn? You probably are- Louis lets out another scream, this one is slightly better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good! Come on! Louis lets out another one that actually causes Ryan to jump back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes that's what I'm talking about! Out of nowhere, Quinn walks up to the two of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (noticing Quinn) Quinn?!? Good to see you! Quinn grabs Louis' arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Ryan) Excuse me for a second. Louis walks with Quinn to a spot that gives them some distance away from Ryan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that guy and I don't trust him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't trust you anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your new friend is dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So is yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave her out of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fighting tomorrow morning Quinn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over. This whole thing is nuts. I'm walking away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me walk away from you first then. Louis starts to walk away from Quinn. He turns around as he continues to walk backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm coming at you! You are in this game like it or not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey's car pulls up in front of an historic brick building. She slowly gets out and starts to look the structure over. It's almost like she is trying to assess if she has the right place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A awkward young man, JAKE, is sorting through boxes. He's kneeled on the floor organizing a mess of files. Zoey walks up and tries to attract his attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me? Jake comes out of his world of file sorting. He looks up at Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm looking for Mrs. Rhodes. I believe the people here referred to her as "mother".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) People look for a lot of things. Zoey is confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure they do. (looking at the boxes) You guys shutting down?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) We are ceasing operations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there something wrong with you? MRS. RHODES, a 60 year old odd looking lady, comes out of the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down. You need to calm down and count to ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? I don't know what that means. Mrs. Rhodes starts waving her hands at Zoey. She flaps them up and down in her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to calm down and meditate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um...no...listen do you know Quinn Wilson and Louis Marks? They grew up here. Mrs. Rhodes steps back like a vampire who has just seen a cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...You need to leave!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And give me your shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um...no. Zoey turns around and starts to leave. Mrs. Rhodes starts screaming at the top of her lungs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You better make your peace with God girl! The end is coming, those boys are ushering in a new era! Zoey runs down the hallway toward the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey runs outside and makes it to her car. She hits the roof of her vehicle in anger

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a fucking nut house!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) Excuse me! Zoey jumps up and screams. She sees Jake standing creepily behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) I know the young boys you speak of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (doesn't care) And?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) I was here when Quinn got sent to the mental hospital. It was like the other one set it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait Louis? You think Louis made Quinn appear crazy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) They both believed the same thing. Louis was just smart enough to hide it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is more to it than that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) I don't understand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen "Robot Boy", where did this whole belief come from? This isn't something two kids come up with on their own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) Yes I believe a seed was planted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly. I heard there was an employee that got fired for sharing Mormon mythology with the boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (monotone) No. Off base. He's not the right one.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT- A FEW MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Jack sits at the PC while chatting away on his cell phone. It appears he is looking up information for who ever is on the other end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey is parked in a parking lot, while she chats on her cell phone with Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You might be right sweetheart. The employee I was telling you about earlier was instrumental in getting Appleridge Orphanage shut down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Mrs. Rhodes was pretty well known in Huntington. I think she felt this guy was getting in the way of her master plan. Finally, nearly 20 years later, he convinced the state what was really going on there.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Well...elaborate.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: That girl you talked to was "pants crapping nuts". She actually makes your boyfriend look sane. I guess she believes that Lucifer came to her in a vision-

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: -How is that different than a dream? Just saying-

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: -I don't know. I think you have to be awake for a vision. (beat) Will you please pay attention? Anyway he, meaning Lucifer, gave her this jazz about...well you know the story. Two angels, fighting to the death...blah...blah...Anyway he told her she needed to look after Louis and get Quinn out of there. I guess trying to stack the odds in Louis' favor.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: So she had Quinn committed?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: To the same hospital where her nephew was a patient. All on the dark lord's orders I guess.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Fucking Ryan Blood!

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Your friends are fucking whack.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Thanks Jack.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: So what are you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to stop an Apocalyptic battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn Zoey!

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT
dialogues.text: Jack realizes Zoey hung up on him. He slowly puts his phone down and steps away from the computer. He walks over to the couch and sits down. He lets out a sigh of exhaustion as he leans back on the couch.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY AND ANNA'S APARTMENT-A FEW HOURS LATER
dialogues.text: Jack is now sprawled out on the couch. Anna walks in the room and sets a beverage on the coffee table in front of him. She moves his legs and sits down beside of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where is she at now? Jack sits up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got a text about thirty minutes ago. I'm pretty sure she is going to head to Quinn's apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her Christ Complex is going to get her killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me I know Anna. (beat) I know... KNOCKING is heard at the door. Anna gets up to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe it's Quinn the jackass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anna just gets the door opened a crack when... Ryan and Louis BURST into the room. Anna SCREAMS. Louis restrains her against a wall. Jack gets up from the couch, but he meets a gun handle to the head from Ryan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good afternoon boys and girls! I need your assistance.

dialogues.speaker: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Quinn walks into his room. To his surprise, Zoey is sitting on his bed. It appears she has been there for a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do people keep ending up in my room?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) You need to learn to lock up. Quinn walks over and sits on the bed beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not fighting Louis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the change of heart?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you might be right. I don't think it's necessary. I think the world will keep turning one way or another. I'm not dependant on that. (beat) I'm not a savior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really believe? You know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I do believe it. I know it actually. Since I have been with you, I've doubted what I know to be fact though. Then it hit me, it really doesn't matter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help you Quinn. I don't want to do it for myself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to do it because I feel I have to. Obligations, or dark incidents from my past...That's not a reason to help anyone. It makes me fucking selfish actually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not selfish Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I care about you Quinn. That's sincerely my reason for wanting to do this. That's a first for me you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know... Quinn hugs her and they slowly lay down on the bed together.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN'S ROOM- LATER
dialogues.text: Quinn gets pistol whipped across the face. Suddenly we see Louis picking Zoey up by the hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in pain) Let her go! Louis has a hold of Zoey. Quinn gets up and goes for Ryan. Louis drop kicks Quinn and sends him flying across the room. Louis throws Zoey at Ryan. Ryan then holds her at gun point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at Quinn) Let me pretty the girl up a bit Ryan beats her repeatedly with the gun until she passes out cold from the trauma. Quinn tries to get to his feet, but Louis kicks him back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on sunshine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ryan throws Louis the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Louis with great force repeatedly hit Quinn with the gun. Everything goes fuzzy and then we...

dialogues.speaker: INT. QUINN'S ROOM-HOURS LATER
dialogues.text: Quinn slowly gets to his feet. He walks over to the doorway and kneels down. He sees a puddle of blood...Zoey's blood. He puts his fingers in it. He inspects his hand, rubbing the blood between his index finger and thumb. He jumps up and screams in anger. That would be Quinn's version of a battle cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hand rips duct tape off of Jack's mouth. He let's out a loud scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother fucker!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn crouches down beside Jack. Jack and Anna are both tied up, Anna still has duct tape across her mouth. You can hear her muffled screams as they fill the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Zoey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you mother fucker! I'm going to call the fucking fuzz once you untie me! Fucking nut bag, ball sac-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (like he is talking to a retarded child) I...will...come...rescue...you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ass fuck salad- Quinn puts the duct tape back on Jack's mouth. Even though we can't make out what he is saying, he is still running off at the mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That actually felt kind of good. Quinn pats Jack on the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be back guys. Quinn leaves the room. Muffled cursing can be heard through out the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long black box is pulled out from under Quinn's bed. We see Quinn's hands unlatch and then open it. Inside we see Quinn's katana. His hand grips the hilt.
