dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn gets up, holding his katana and ready for a fight. He's dressed in a black biker jacket, kind of looking like the Bride from Kill Bill. He walks to the doorway. He stands still for a second. He's preparing his next move. Bad ass comic book pose...'nuff said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front doors to the church swing open. Light fills the sanctuary. Zoey walks through the doors. She heads toward the alter and sees a man, in his 50's, kneeling. It appears he might be praying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She places her hand on his shoulder. As he turns around she sees her Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not doing it anymore. You will not have redemption from me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (raspy) Zoey... He reaches for her, she pulls away. She starts to back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take ownership of what you did. Don't rely on me to save you. I need to start saving myself. She slowly backs up and then turns to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as she is turning) Goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY'S FACE
dialogues.text: Ryan slaps Zoey in the face to wake her up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ryan pulls Zoey up to her feet. He presses the gun against her head. Louis walks out into the middle of the field. He's dressed in a full ninja outfit. He unsheathes his katana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think Zoey? I'm a ninja!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (struggling under Ryan's grip) You're fucking crazy!

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: That's not nice! I think I look good.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: I think you're a fucking nut bag.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: This is going to be fun. You'll see.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Mrs Rhodes? Does that name ring a bell?

dialogues.speaker: RYAN BLOOD
dialogues.text: My aunt?

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: Yeah...yeah...she played a part in the game. Tell us something we don't know. You're such a sexy Nancy Drew right now.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Go fuck yourself.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: Or a foul mouthed Velma. That gets me so hard. Does that get you hard Ryan?

dialogues.speaker: RYAN BLOOD
dialogues.text: Can we go back to my aunt please?

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Mrs. Rhodes? What about her? Other than she fucked you guys up. She taught you, Louis how to play it straight. Then she has you fuck Quinn over.

dialogues.speaker: RYAN BLOOD
dialogues.text: She didn't fuck Quinn over. She just helped him out.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Yeah by getting him in contact with you.

dialogues.speaker: RYAN BLOOD
dialogues.text: She knew one day it was all going to catch up with her. She trained me to get into the game. She told me it was my destiny.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: Is that why she placed you in that hospital?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was my caretaker. She told me she was sending me someone. Someone I would have to guide on to the right path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys I have let my parents fuck me up. There comes a time though where you have to go out on your own. Take responsibility for your own life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a much bigger purpose. You'll see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This whole thing was to carry out some delusional woman's master plan. She doesn't even remember who she is at this point. I went to see her...she wanted me to take off my shirt. Louis is irritated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you shut up?!? You are ruining my climatic fight. Louis spies Quinn in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Showtime.

dialogues.speaker: START CHOIR MUSIC
dialogues.text: Quinn lowers his katana, it brushes against the blades of grass. Louis follows suit as he slowly walks to meet Quinn in the middle. The two warriors stand on opposite sides of the battle field.

dialogues.speaker: END CHOIR MUSIC
dialogues.text: Quinn looks over and sees Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go! Ryan grabs her tighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet...

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (To Louis) Is this the game you want to play?

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: I'm not going to lose this time.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: (To Quinn) I thought you didn't believe this shit anymore.

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: There's more going on than you realize Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: This is fucked. Quinn you're not 5000 years old. You were born in an orphanage. None of this makes sense.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: Lady, it would look weird if we roamed the earth for 5000 years without facing a mortal death! We keep getting reborn, sometimes we even switch physical form. Thanks for coming to the game late missy!

dialogues.speaker: ZOEY
dialogues.text: That makes total fucking sense. Color me stupid!

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: (to Louis) You don't get it do you.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: What?!?

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: If you win...you're not becoming the antichrist.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: What are you talking about??

dialogues.speaker: QUINN
dialogues.text: It's   Ryan...it's always been Ryan.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: (To Ryan) What is he talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's pitting us against each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to be honest with you Louis. I've always been honest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah sometimes to a fault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have always played this game as honest as we could. We never did anything to undermine the other. Despite what you represent, you have moral code. (beat) You are not acting with in that code today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm tired of losing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're losing right now. Your actions, you can't win like this. Not acting this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm tired of you. I'm going to end it! Louis goes over to Ryan. He trades his sword in for Ryan's gun. Ryan holds the katana to Zoey's throat. Louis points the gun dead at Quinn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You going to shoot me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the endgame. Tense moment as Louis aims the gun at Quinn. SUDDENLY he spins and shoots Ryan dead in the head. Ryan falls and Zoey gets free. Louis looks at Quinn and then throws the gun far out into the field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK...I guess I do have some morals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey gets her bearings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey go home. We need to finish this. Louis walks over to Ryan and grabs his katana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No you don't. Guys what are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go home girl!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you being serious? Quinn stops and turns toward Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will always love you. You have to go though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't walk away from this field right now, you will lose me. I will not be in your corner. I will call for help. They will stop you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn...last chance. Zoey walks over to Ryan's body. She searches till she finds her cell phone in his front pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will call the police Quinn... Quinn looks at Zoey, dead in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye. Quinn turns toward Louis. He pulls his katana up to attack position and Louis follows suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tearing up) Wow...yeah goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quinn and Louis charge each other. Zoey doesn't bother to stay to watch the battle. She slowly walks away. Quinn and Louis' swords meet. The clang is triumphant. Details of this climatic battle will be choreographed by the actors involved, but think high flying Shaw Brothers film. We don't see a clear victor, just the two boys going at it until we can't tell who is who.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER SIDE OF THE FIELD-AWAY FROM THE BATTLE
dialogues.text: Zoey starts to make a call on her cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts to dial 911. Her thumb moves in the position to hit send.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER SIDE OF THE FIELD
dialogues.text: Zoey stops. She slowly puts her phone away. She looks back toward where the battle is going on. She starts to walk back. The walk turns into a jog. Finally the jog turns into a full run.

dialogues.speaker: OPEN FIELD
dialogues.text: When she gets to the field Quinn and Louis are gone. All that can be seen is Ryan Blood's body, two katanas and an empty ninja suit. Zoey leans down and touches Quinn's katana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs to herself) I am Curious:Yellow (beat) Goodbye boys... Zoey stares out into the open field. She feels reborn. She knows there is a new world, a new perspective for her beyond the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera slowly pans toward an older ninety year old Zoey. She's behind a podium, there is a sign on the front that reads: Marshal University Association of Free Thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For years we have thought absence of the impossible indicated that we were exercising free thought. In my experience ladies and gentleman, that's not the case. (beat) Believing in hope my friends, opening yourself up to accepting there might be more than the world around you. That's truly being a free thinker. The camera ends with a close shot on Zoey's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey sits on the same bench where she met Quinn. Her great-granddaughter, JENNIFER walks up. She sits down beside her grandmother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Grandma.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look solemn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just sitting here...thinking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you thinking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've had a great life. A wonderful husband, children, grandchildren... (motions to Jennifer) ...great grandchildren...I spent so much of my youth being angry. I wish I could relive my life now, knowing what I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do have a lot of wisdom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've tried to pass it on to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've taught me a lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just remember, you can believe what you want to believe Jennifer. Live by what ever moral code you want to live by. Just make sure it's yours. Don't let it stem from anger or past tragedies. (beat) Let it come from your heart. Jennifer turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My new boyfriend. The one I wanted you to meet. Zoey turns around to see the BOYFRIEND walking toward them. It shouldn't come to a surprise that he looks a lot like Quinn. Jennifer gets up and grabs her boyfriend around the waist. He reaches his hand out to Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervous) Nice to meet to ma'am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes his hand) Likewise. Jennifer grabs his hand right after his handshake with Zoey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We better get going. We're going to grab something to eat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the boyfriend) I didn't catch your name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry. I'm being rude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) He can be like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Louis. Zoey is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Zoey) You OK?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I'm fine. (snapping out of it) Enjoy dinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you later on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (making eye contact with Zoey, smiling) Nice to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (returning contact, and smiles) Likewise. The two lovebirds walk away. Zoey stares at them for a second. A it "can't be look" crosses her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zoey smiles almost to say to the camera that there is more out there. Things that we don't fully understand. The smile then fades. Her final look is that of content. And then as Done and Dusted plays we...
